features.title: Responsive navigation
features.description: Navigation smoothly adapts to the device the application renders to.

features.title: Modular design
features.description: Desiged with full modularity to enable collaboration while minimizing the final bundle size and loading time.

features.title: UI elements
features.description: Rich collections of advanced UI elements ready to use for you to avoid re-inventing the wheel.

features.title: File storage
